title: [Visual Bug] Infernal Diana Skin

embed.description: Not sure how to reproduce the steps, but it was visible on both sides & persisted through death.

body:
Not sure how to reproduce the steps, but it was visible on both sides & persisted through death.
This is the first time it's happened to me.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is odd, however if you're unable to provide reproducible steps then it's safe to assume it was just a once-off issue.
